decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - Unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority, the development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved drawings and documents as listed below:
Design and Access Statement; Temporary Access Arrangements (Elementa, August 2022); Cover Letter (Carter Jonas, 18th August 2022); Planning Statement (Carter Jonas); Transport Technical Note (Steer, 17 August 2022);
P07202-HYD-P3-XX-SK-C-0022 Rev P02; HVE1-GA-HYD-DR-480-600 Rev P5; HVE1-GA-HYD-DR-480-601 Rev P4; HVE1-GA-HYD-DR-480-602 Rev P4; HVE1-GA-HYD-DR-480-603 Rev P4; HVE1-GA-HYD-DR-480-610 Rev P4; HVE-BL-ZZ-XX-DR-A-10002 Rev P3.

REASON: To ensure that the development is carried out to the highest standards of architecture and materials.

Condition : 3 - The temporary road hereby approved between Hargrave Drive and Marketing Suite and associated temporary Marketing Suite car park within Plot D8 shall be removed / closed either when the Marketing Suite is closed or by the completion of Coover Road whichever is the later. 

The land shall be made good and the soft and hard landscape works shall be carried out in accordance with details as so approved within the relevant plots. 

Reason: To permit reconsideration in the light of circumstances then prevailing as the proposed development is not considered satisfactory as a permanent measure.

Condition : 4 - The temporary road hereby approved between the Marketing Suite parking access and Sasson Road and temporary turning head adjacent to Block K shall be removed on completion of Eastman Road.

The land shall be made good and the soft and hard landscape works shall be carried out in accordance with details as so approved within the relevant plots. 

Reason: To permit reconsideration in the light of circumstances then prevailing as the proposed development is not considered satisfactory as a permanent measure.

Condition : 5 - The temporary fire tender access road adjacent to Block L hereby approved shall be removed / closed on completion of Coover Road. 

The land shall be made good and the soft and hard landscape works shall be carried out in accordance with details as so approved within the relevant plots. 

Reason: To permit reconsideration in the light of circumstances then prevailing as the proposed development is not considered satisfactory as a permanent measure.
description: Proposed temporary vehicle access road and temporary car park for Marketing Suite linking across Plots D7, D8, A5 and D2 of the Harrow View East Masterplan site.
